mapper.select: select count(*) from project where code = #{code} and userId=#{userId}
select count(*) from topic where code = #{code} and userId=#{userId}
select B.* from (select A.*, rownum r from (select * from project where userId=#{userId} and code=#{code} order by proNum desc) A order by proNum desc) B where r >= #{start} and r <= #{end}
select B.* from (select A.*, rownum r from (select * from topic where userId=#{userId} and code=#{code} order by topNum desc) A order by topNum desc) B where r >= #{start} and r <= #{end}
select count(*) from topcomments where code = #{code} and userId=#{userId}

select B.* from (select A.*, rownum r from (SELECT t.topTitle, c.* FROM topic t, topComments c WHERE c.code = #{code} and c.userId=#{userId} and t.topNum = c.topnum) A order by a.topcomnum desc) B where r >= #{start} and r <= #{end}
select count(*) from users where userid = #{id} and code=#{code} and auth='1'
select count(*) from users where code = #{code}
select B.*, r from (select rownum r, A.* from (select * from users where code = #{code} order by name)A order by name) B where r >= #{start} and r <= #{end}
select count(*) from users where ${sel} like '%'||#{search}||'%' and code = #{code}
